text: Jis shaks ke paas kitaab ka ilam tha woh bola “main aapki palakh jhapakne se pehle usey laye deta hoon”. Junhi ke Sulaiman ne woh takht apne paas rakkha hua dekha, woh pukar uttha “Yeh mere Rub ka fazal hai taa-ke woh mujhey aazmaaye ke main shukar karta hoon ya kaafir e niyamat karta hoon. Aur jo koi shukar karta hai uska shukar uske apne hi liye mufeed hai, warna koi nashukari karey to mera Rubb be-niyaz aur apni zaat mein aap buzurg hai.”
